verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Judge me, O Jehovah, for I have walked in my integrity; I also have trusted in Jehovah; I shall not slide.
Examine me, O Jehovah, and prove me; purify my reins and my heart.
For Your mercy is before my eyes; and I have walked in Your truth.
I have not sat with lying men; and I will not go in with those dissembling;
I have hated the assembly of evildoers, and I will not sit with the wicked ones.
I will wash my palms in innocence; so I will go around Your altar, O Jehovah,
to cause to hear with the voice of thanksgiving and recount all Your wonderful works.
O Jehovah, I have loved the abode of Your house, and the place of the dwelling of Your glory.
Do not gather up my soul with sinners, and my life with men of blood,
in whose hand is a plot, and their right hand is full of a bribe.
But I will walk in my integrity; redeem me and be gracious to me.
My foot stands in an even place; in the assemblies I will bless Jehovah.
